que: Which of the following statement is correct for AngularJS?
On which of the Architectural pattern AngularJS is based?
Which of the following is the correct syntax for writing AngularJS expressions?
Which of the following directive is used to bind the application data to the HTML view in AngularJS?

Which of the following statement is true about the lowercase filter?
option1: The lowercase filter converts a text to lower case text.
option2: The lowercase filter is a function that takes text as input.
ans: The lowercase filter converts a text to lower case text.

que: Which of the following is an advantage of AngularJS?
